Student ID should be a Number

In accordance with the school program and the results of the socialization on October 15 2018, it is hereby notified that the Study Tour (Student Tour) will be held in December 2018 (around December 9 2018/2nd week). One of the considerations is anticipating the plan to increase fuel prices, so that the cost burden for the study tour can be reduced (ie Rp. 875,000).

In connection with the 2022/2023 Odd Semester Final Examinations in accordance with the Letter of the Head of the Academic Administration Bureau dated 21 December 2022 Concerning Notification of the Final Semester Examinations, we hereby notify that:
1. Final Examinations for Odd Semester 2022/2023 will be held from 16 to 21 January 2023.
2. Lecturers can carry out exams if the lecture has reached a minimum of 85%.
3. Students can take the exam if they have paid their Phase II Tuition Fee and have a test card printed by the Academic Faculty (SBAK).

With regard to the Covid-19 Pandemic, distribution of Even Semester Report Cards for 2020/2021 will be carried out online on Monday, 28 June 2021 via the official website of SMK Negeri 21 Jakarta. Distribution of Even Semester Report Cards for 2020/2021 online is not a substitute for Print Report Cards. The original report card will be given offline while waiting for official notification from the Government regarding Large-Scale Social Restrictions.

In connection with semester I learning activities, for the 2020/2021 academic year, which ends on December 23 2020, the odd semester holiday activities fall on December 24 â€“ 31 2020. Even semester learning activities will resume on January 4 2021. Learning Activities -Teaching (KBM) in even semesters, for the time being still using online (in-network) and offline (out-of-network) modes, until further announcements are made.
